description: A dimly lit Yichang Museum at night. The Sun Man Statue lights up and begins moving with rhythmic beats. Wearing sunglasses and doing hip-hop moves.
music_effect: Fusion of traditional Yichang instruments with modern hip-hop beat.
narration: Yo yo yo, 看这儿！我是太阳人，穿越千年的文化担当！
speaker: 太阳人

description: Camera pans to a glowing orb turning into Bo Xiaoyi, a cute futuristic digital mascot, gently landing beside the statue.
music_effect: Futuristic shimmer and soft landing tone.
narration: 你好呀，太阳人前辈！我是博小翼，刚来报到。
speaker: 博小翼

description: The Sun Man tilts his head in curiosity, circling Bo Xiaoyi and inspecting him playfully.
music_effect: Playful drum hit and record scratch.
narration: 你这小家伙是哪来的？博物馆还能招AI啦？
speaker: 太阳人

description: Bo Xiaoyi projects a holographic interface showing dialogue, voice input, and a phone scanning a statue photo.
music_effect: Glitchy UI sound + light synth tones.
narration: 我可厉害啦！游客可以和我打字、语音，甚至拍照提问呢～
speaker: 博小翼

description: The museum lights gently rise, showing more artifacts waking up curiously. The statue and Bo Xiaoyi laugh together.
music_effect: Warm orchestral rise + soft ambient sound.
narration: 有你陪着，我们这些老家伙终于能被更多人看见啦～
speaker: 太阳人

description: Fade out with a CTA overlay: 'Yichang Museum x 博小翼 · 一起让文物说话！'
music_effect: Gentle fade-out melody with final harp stroke.
narration: 博物馆，不只是看，更是对话的开始。
speaker: 博小翼
